testcase.classname: Book a Slot for baby photoshoot
testcase.name: User is trying to login with incorrect credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User open Browser and navigates to landing page.......................passed Given User is on login pop..................................................passed When User enters "Cusion" and "Cusion123@"..................................passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then "Wrong username or password." Error should be displayed on the Popup...passed And "Cusion" and "Cusion123@" are retained..................................passed

testcase.classname: Book a Slot for baby photoshoot
testcase.name: User is trying to purchase Baby Shower package before photoshoot in the cart with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User open Browser and navigates to landing page.......................passed Given User is on login pop..................................................passed When User enters "AwwwDec" and "Aww@123"....................................passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then "Login Successful. Redirecting..." should be displayed on the POpup....passed And MyAccount should be displayed after redirecting from login pop up.......passed When User mouse Hover on Maternity Service..................................passed And Select BabyShower.......................................................passed And Select "Awww Baby Shower Package" Package...............................passed Then Package detail page should displayed...................................passed When User enters BookingDate as"30/06/2021".................................passed And click on AddtoCart button...............................................passed Then Alert pop up should displayed with text "Please select some product options before adding this product to your cart.".passed And After accepting that pop up User stays on same page.....................passed

testcase.classname: Book a Slot for baby photoshoot
testcase.name: User add photoshoot to cart and then see error on the billing page
testcase.system-out: Given User open Browser and navigates to landing page.......................passed Given User is on login pop..................................................passed When User enters "AwwwDec" and "Aww@123"....................................passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then "Login Successful. Redirecting..." should be displayed on the POpup....passed And MyAccount should be displayed after redirecting from login pop up.......passed When User mouse Hover on Maternity Service..................................passed And Select Baby Photoshoot..................................................passed And Update the filter to 12800..............................................passed And Click on image of the product...........................................passed Then Product detail page should displayed with View prop button.............passed When User clicks on View Prop button........................................passed Then new window will open with drive link...................................passed When User close the second page and switch to parent page...................passed And click on Add to cart....................................................passed Then Addtocart successful message will be displayed.........................passed When User clicks on view cart button........................................passed Then User navigates to cart and product is added with quantity 1............passed When User Increases the cart quantity to "4"................................passed And User click on Checkout..................................................passed Then Billing page should be displayed.......................................passed When User clicks on Proced..................................................passed Then User can see error message on the top of the page......................passed

Redirecting..." should be displayed on the POpup....passed And MyAccount should be displayed after redirecting from login pop up.......passed When User clicks on Logout..................................................passed Then User should be logged out and My Account button should not be displayed..passed
